Posts.Content: Breast cancer is very common cancer for women, but we can prevent or fight it by examining ourselves always. It's important to do that because even in our little way, we can help not only ourselves but everyone. cheer up guys
Posts.Title: Monthly breast self examination video

Posts.Content: Breast cancer is what makes me feels so weak =(
Posts.Title: Anyone else getting bad care for their breast cancer

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by Kermica Welcome Ray2, to the place no one wants to be but many come to value. Sorry to hear about your wife's scary situation. I don't have any answers for you but am going to move your post to the Breast Cancer Forum where there are many knowledgeable and caring people who should have input you can use. Good luck to your wife (and to you for continuing remission from your MM). Good health, kermica Oh, sorry to hear about your wife Ray. Hope she can fight it.
